description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Arena of Fire is a particle simulator akin to the falling sand internet phenomenon games.  Arena of Fire uses the Xbox's video card to perform all the particle logic, providing an extremely fast high-definition simulation.  The elements included are dirt, concrete, water, oil, fire, plant, and gunpowder.
